retire.specific: Are you sure you want to archive {0} {1}?
retire.list: Are you sure you want to archive {0} {1} for this list?

delete.list: Are you sure you want to remove {0} {1} from this list?

newPassConfirm.label: New Password (Confirmation)
newPassConfirm.nomatch: The new passwords do not match

delete.label: Delete Profile
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your profile? This can not be reverted!

success.kbart: The KBART Import has started. You may check its status via your dashboard.

Invalid TIPPs.label: Invalid TIPPs
Invalid TIPPs.info: An update for this package failed because of invalid TIPP information
Invalid TIPPs.action: The package as not been updated
Invalid TIPPs.toDo: Check records for erroneous or missing information

Major Identifier Mismatch.label: Major Identifier Mismatch
Major Identifier Mismatch.info: title was matched on one identifier, but at least one other ingest identifier differs from existing ones in the same namespace
Major Identifier Mismatch.toDo: Check if the new title with the same identifier is correct. Merge titles if necessary. Check identifiers and delete them if they are incorrect.

Minor Identifier Mismatch.label: Minor Identifier Mismatch
Minor Identifier Mismatch.info: Title matched, but ingest identifiers differ from existing ones in the same namespaces.
Minor Identifier Mismatch.toDo: CCheck identifiers and delete them if they are incorrect.

Multiple Matches.label: Multiple Matches
Multiple Matches.info: Multiple titles were matched on one identifier, but none matched for all given identifiers.
Multiple Matches.toDo: Check if the new title with the same identifier is correct. Merge titles if necessary. Check identifiers and delete them if they are incorrect.

Name Mismatch.label: Name Mismatch
Name Mismatch.info: Title was matched via secondary id, but had a different name.
Name Mismatch.action: New title name added as variant of existing title name
Name Mismatch.toDo: Check if the title name is a valid alternative.

Name Similarity.label: Name Similarity
Name Similarity.info: No matched components via identifiers, but a title with a similar name already exists.
Name Similarity.toDo: Check if the title name is a valid alternative."

Namespace Mismatch.label: Namespace Mismatch
Namespace Mismatch.info: Ingest file issn matched an existing eissn or vice versa.
Namespace Mismatch.toDo: Check if an issn is erroneously marked as eissn or vice versa and correct those identifiers if necessary.

New Platform.label: New Platform
New Platform.info: The platform did not exist and was newly created.

Platform Noncurrent.label: Platform Noncurrent
Platform Noncurrent.info: The existing platform matched for this TIPP is marked as [Platform Status]!

Removed Identifier.label: Removed Identifier
Removed Identifier.info: An identifier has been removed due to...

TIPPs Retired.label: TIPPs Retired
TIPPs Retired.info: An update to package [PKG-ID] did not contain [Number of missing TIPPs] previously existing TIPPs.

Type Mismatch.label: Type Mismatch
Type Mismatch.info: A provided identifier matched an existing component of another type.

Ambiguous Matches.label: Ambiguous Matches
Ambiguous Matches.action: Multiple titles were matched on all identifiers as well as the provided title name.
Ambiguous Matches.toDo: Check titles for duplicates. Merge titles if necessary. Check identifier duplicates and delete them if they are incorrect.
